text: In need of a hair color makeover, but not willing to take the plunge into a fiery red hue? Follow in the footsteps of celebs like Katie Cassidy and Kirstie Alley, who recently made the switch to the dark side, and dye your hair a rich brunette. Need further convincing? Celebrity colorist Jennifer J., who dyed the locks of Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and other Twilight Saga stars on the set of Breaking Dawn : Part 1, tells Us Weekly how easy it is below. PHOTOS : The best beauty looks from the Breaking Dawn Part 1 premiere Q : What's a key rule to choosing a shade that will complement my skin tone?
